original_title: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Yordenis Ugas
overview: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Yordenis Ugás was a professional boxing welterweight unification bout between WBC and IBF welterweight champion Errol Spence Jr., and WBA (Super) welterweight champion, Yordenis Ugás. The fight took place on April 16, 2022.
title: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Yordenis Ugas
